Watch: Family of orcas with calf in tow delight Marlborough Sounds boaties with 'amazing show' https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watch-family-of-orcas-with-calf-in-tow-delight-boaties-with-amazing-show/RRNHZAJBMVGXXABYAI3DLI2ANI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watch-family-of-orcas-with-calf-in-tow-delight-boaties-with-amazing-show/RRNHZAJBMVGXXABYAI3DLI2ANI/ Kirsty WynnA woman fishing said orcas swimming in formation was the perfect start to the year.
